description:
Serious warmth for keeping spirits high. The Patagonia Down Vest provides a layer of warmth on snow days and other chilly outings. Sustainably made from recycled fish nets and reclaimed down, you can rest assured knowing kids are comfortable while you do your part for the planet.

  • NetPlus® recycled nylon shell is made from fishing nets removed from the ocean
  • DWR finish sheds light rain
  • Recycled polyester lining with HeiQ® Eco antimicrobial finish
  • Recycled 600-fill power goose and duck down is compressible and warm
  • Down is reclaimed for recycled down products
  • Quilted construction secures the down in place
  • 2 zippered handwarmer pockets keep treasures safe
  • Elastic binding on hem and armholes seal out drafts
  • Internal hand-me-down ID label
name: Patagonia Down Sweater Vest - Youths

value: 600 fill-power recycled goose and duck down blend
